meanings.sent1: The picnic basket was filled with the amplest amount of delicious food.
meanings.sent2: She had the amplest collection of books in the entire library.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gathered the amplest amount of acorns for the winter.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was the amplest sound in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The sun provided the amplest light for the garden to bloom.

meanings.definition: Fully sufficient or more than adequate for the purpose or needs; plentiful.
meanings.sent1: The amplest supply of water ensured the plants thrived in the garden.
meanings.sent2: They received the amplest support from their friends during the difficult time.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the amplest spot on the couch to take a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the amplest welcome to all who entered the room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher provided the amplest explanation for the complex math problem.
